intent_atoms.description: Improve visual clarity and accessibility of macOS UI components by ensuring DS.Colors.tertiary is used as a background color instead of a label color.
DS.Colors.tertiary on macOS returns .controlBackgroundColor, providing ≥4.5:1 contrast with window backgrounds in both Light and Dark modes.
All semantic colors are non‑nil and platform parity is maintained between iOS and macOS.
DS.Colors.tertiary must always be a background color on macOS and not a label color.
Use .controlBackgroundColor for DS.Colors.tertiary on macOS to match iOS's .tertiarySystemBackground and adhere to Apple HIG.

functional_units.name: DS.Colors.tertiary macOS background color token
functional_units.description: Provides a subtle background color for macOS components, matching iOS's tertiarySystemBackground and ensuring WCAG AA contrast

functional_units.name: testTertiaryColorIsBackgroundColorOnMacOS test
functional_units.description: Regression test verifying DS.Colors.tertiary uses proper background color on macOS

functional_units.name: testTertiaryColorPlatformParity test
functional_units.description: Test ensuring semantic consistency of DS.Colors.tertiary across iOS and macOS

functional_units.name: testAllSemanticColorsAreNotNil test
functional_units.description: Prevents accidental breakage by asserting all semantic color definitions are non‑nil

functional_units.name: Bug Fix - macOS Tertiary Color Contrast preview
functional_units.description: SwiftUI preview demonstrating correct contrast for DS.Colors.tertiary in SidebarPattern, InspectorPattern, Card, SurfaceStyle etc.

functional_units.name: SidebarPattern component
functional_units.description: UI pattern showing a detail content area with proper background separation using DS.Colors.tertiary

functional_units.name: InspectorPattern component
functional_units.description: UI pattern panel that uses DS.Colors.tertiary for background differentiation

functional_units.name: Card component
functional_units.description: Component that displays card backgrounds using DS.Colors.tertiary

functional_units.name: SurfaceStyle component
functional_units.description: Applies the style with background color set to DS.1?
